short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Log hours on Clockify at the same time you change status on ClickUp on a Chrome Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tools is planned to have many features, but on this version we are limited by a single feature:

Allow the user to click a button and copy the Clickup Task ID and Title to his clipboard.

While you have a task selected or open, click on the pink button on your bottom right corner.
